UserFormPage.server-error-message: A server error occurred while submitting the form. Please try again.
UserFormPage.unknown-error-message: An unknown error occurred while submitting the form. Please try again.

PassportDetails.doc-type-header: What type of passport or travel document do you have?
PassportDetails.doc-type-hint: Enter the information on the travel document you will be using when traveling to the U.S.
PassportDetails.doc-type-select-label: Your travel document should be a valid, unexpired passport or other valid, unexpired documentation that is sufficient to establish your identity and nationality.
PassportDetails.issuer-select-label: Choose the country or authority that issued the document you will use to travel to the United States.
